speech.exerciseComplete: Great job completing that exercise! You're making excellent progress. Let's continue with the next level.
speech.boxMethodComplete: Fantastic work with the 3D Box Method! You're developing strong visualization skills for multiplication.
speech.onboardingComplete: Welcome, {{name}}! I'm excited to help you practice {{topic}} in {{subject}}. Choose an exercise to get started!

tutorial.initial: Let's start learning multiplication! I'll guide you through each step.
tutorial.selectRow: First, let's set the number of rows. Use the slider to change it.
tutorial.selectColumn: Great! Now set the number of columns using the other slider.
tutorial.countCubes: Count how many boxes we have in total. Each row has the same number of boxes.
tutorial.inputAnswer: Type your answer in the input box and click 'Check' when you're ready.
tutorial.celebration: Fantastic job! You got it right! ðŸŽ‰
tutorial.newChallenge: Let's try another problem to practice more.
tutorial.done: You've completed this tutorial! You're doing great with multiplication.

speech.startMultiplication: Let's practice multiplication together! I'll guide you through each step.
speech.startBoxMethod: The 3D Box Method is a great way to visualize multiplication! Let me walk you through an example. First, you'll see place values broken down - like 24 becomes 20 and 4. Each cell in the grid represents the product of those values. Let's say we're solving 6 Ã— 24. First, click on a cell, then add blocks to represent the product of those values - for example, 6 Ã— 20 = 120, so add one 100-block and two 10-blocks. Click 'Check' when done. Complete all cells, then add them together for your final answer!
speech.backToExercises: Let's go back to the exercise selection. What would you like to practice next?
speech.welcome: Hi there! ðŸ‘‹ Ready to explore some fun math exercises?

welcome.title: Welcome to GradeAid!
welcome.description: Learn in a fun and interactive way!

basicMultiplication.title: Basic Multiplication
basicMultiplication.description: Start with simple multiplication problems to build your foundation.

boxMethod.title: Box Method
boxMethod.description: Learn the box method to visualize and understand multiplication better.

multiplication.title: Basic Multiplication
multiplication.description: Practice multiplication with an environmental theme!
multiplication.details: Start with simple multiplication problems and work your way up to more complex ones. Each exercise is connected to environmental themes like planting trees or installing solar panels.

boxMethod.title: 3D Box Method
boxMethod.description: Experience Box Method in 3D interactive space!
boxMethod.details: Visualize multiplication using a 3D box method that helps understand the concept spatially. Great for visual learners!

steps.step1: Count the boxes in each row
steps.step2: Count how many rows there are
steps.step3: Multiply: rows Ã— boxes in each row

tips.tip2: Count all boxes to find the answer

multiplicationExercise.adjustSlidersText: Adjust rows and columns by moving the dots above

boxMethod3D.hintContent: Break down each number by place value. Fill each box with the corresponding product of the values.
boxMethod3D.followTutorial: Please follow the tutorial. Click on the highlighted cell.
boxMethod3D.placeValueBreakdown: Let's break down our numbers by place value. This makes multiplication easier to understand visually.
boxMethod3D.gridExplanation: This grid represents our multiplication problem. Each cell shows the product of the corresponding row and column values.
boxMethod3D.firstCell: Let's start with the first cell. This represents the product of the first digits from each number.
boxMethod3D.secondCell: Great! Now let's fill the second cell. This represents the product of the first digit from the first number and the second digit from the second number.
boxMethod3D.thirdCell: Now let's fill the third cell. This represents the product of the second digit from the first number and the first digit from the second number.
boxMethod3D.fourthCell: Finally, let's fill the fourth cell. This represents the product of the second digits from each number.
boxMethod3D.sumExplanation: Now we add all the cell values together to get our final answer! This is the complete product of our original numbers.
boxMethod3D.tutorialComplete: Great job! You've completed the tutorial. Now you're ready to try exercises on your own.

details.tree: Your multiplication skills have helped plant trees and restore natural habitats. Amazing job!
details.household: Your multiplication skills have helped provide clean energy to homes in the community. Amazing job!
details.solar: Your multiplication skills have helped generate clean energy for the community. Amazing job!

boxMethod3D.problemComplete: Amazing! You've completed all parts of the problem!

tutorial.welcome: Welcome to the Box Method tutorial! Let's solve 6 Ã— 24 together. I'll guide you through each step.
tutorial.selectCell: First, let's select the top-left cell. Click on it to begin.
tutorial.addHundredBlock: Now, let's add a 100 block to represent 6 Ã— 20.
tutorial.addTenBlocks: Let's add two 10 blocks to complete the first cell.
tutorial.checkFirstCell: Great! Now let's check if our first cell is correct.
tutorial.selectSecondCell: Now, let's select the top-right cell.
tutorial.addSecondCellBlocks: Let's add the blocks for 6 Ã— 4. We need two 10 blocks and four 1 blocks.
tutorial.checkSecondCell: Let's check if our second cell is correct.
tutorial.explainSum: Now we can add up all the cells to get our final answer: 6 Ã— 24 = 144.
tutorial.complete: Excellent! You've completed the tutorial. Now you can try solving problems on your own!

aiTutorBubble.readyToHelp: AI Tutor is ready to help!

basicMultiplication.welcome: Welcome to Basic Multiplication! Let's start with some simple problems.
basicMultiplication.addRows: Let's add 4 rows! Watch how I move the slider.
basicMultiplication.addColumns: Now let's add 6 columns! Watch the slider move.
basicMultiplication.countBoxes: Now you can count the boxes and enter your answer! Take your time and think carefully.
basicMultiplication.correctAnswer: Great job! You counted all the boxes correctly!
basicMultiplication.tryAgain: Let's try counting again. Take your time and count each box carefully.
basicMultiplication.createYourOwn: Great! Now you can try with different numbers. Move the sliders to create your own multiplication problem!
basicMultiplication.correctFeedback: Great job! You got it right! Try another one with different numbers!
basicMultiplication.incorrectFeedback: That's okay! Let's try another one. Remember to take your time and think carefully.
basicMultiplication.masterFeedback: Amazing! You've mastered basic multiplication! You're ready for the next step, champion! Click the Next button when you're ready to try the box method!
basicMultiplication.practiceFeedback: You're doing great! Let's practice 3 more exercises to make sure you're really comfortable with basic multiplication.
basicMultiplication.nextBoxMethod: Great! Let's move on to the box method. This will help you understand multiplication even better!

boxMethodMultiplication.welcome: Welcome to Box Method Multiplication! Let's visualize multiplication using boxes.
boxMethodMultiplication.exerciseComplete: Excellent work! You've mastered the box method! Would you like to try another problem?

soundCheck.title: Let's check your sound
soundCheck.description: Make sure your speakers or headphones are on. When ready, click the button below to hear Aidly!
